items.title: Apple’s official Natural Milanese Loop just hit a new Amazon all-time low at nearly 25% off
items.summary:
Apple’s latest official Milanese Loop is easily one of the most gorgeous Apple Watch bands out there if you ask me, but they are not cheap. With a regularly $199 sticker price, any kind of deal we can come up with is notable and the Natural Milanese Loop for Apple Watch Ultra 2/3 just hit its best price ever at Amazon.

items.title: An analysis of 5,290 AI research papers at NeurIPS: 141, or ~3%, had US-China AI lab collaboration, up from 134 in 2024; Llama featured in 106 Chinese papers (Will Knight/Wired)
items.summary:
Will Knight / Wired:
An analysis of 5,290 AI research papers at NeurIPS: 141, or ~3%, had US-China AI lab collaboration, up from 134 in 2024; Llama featured in 106 Chinese papers  —  WIRED analyzed more than 5,000 papers from NeurIPS using OpenAI's Codex to understand the areas where the US and China actually work together on AI research.

Baseus Zinc Alloy Nylon Braided USB-C cable

Buy for $4 (Reg. $8)

Enter promo code CUEQ2RMV during checkout.

What we love

This 3.3-foot Baseus USB-C cable is a solid upgrade if you’re tired of flimsy cords that fray after a few months. It uses a nylon-braided exterior with zinc alloy connector housings for added durability. This cable is also pretty good when it comes to the overall performance as it’s capable of delivering up to 100W of power and supporting data transfer speeds up to 480MB/s.

items.title: Apps for boycotting American products surge to the top of the Danish App Store

items.title: Anthropic’s new Claude ‘constitution’: be helpful and honest, and don’t destroy humanity
items.summary: Anthropic is overhauling Claude's so-called "soul doc." The new missive is a 57-page document titled "Claude's Constitution," which details "Anthropic's intentions for the model's values and behavior," aimed not at outside readers but the model itself. The document is designed to spell out Claude's "ethical character" and "core identity," including how it should balance conflicting […]

items.title: This Anker 100W 3-port GaN Prime charger is half the size of Apple’s, now down to one of its lowest prices at $45
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find Anker’s official storefront offering its 100W 3-port Prime charger for $45.49 shipped. Originally priced at $85, this USB-C charger has more recently hovered around $70 on Amazon. Today’s deal drops it by $25, bringing it within just $3.50 of the lowest price we’ve seen there. It briefly hit $35 at Best Buy during last year’s Prime Day, which only a few were able to grab before it sold out. It’s now fetching one of the best prices we’ve tracked, making this a great time to cash in if you’ve been wanting to replace a bulky old charger with something compact.
